oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gen. Bragg's headquarters on Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn. "Along the Dixie Highway."
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of a section of Missionary Ridge known as Bragg's Headquarters. Cannons, monuments, and a tower are visible on the side of a road that splits off in multiple directions. Features a white border, divided back, narrative, and handwritten correspondence on reverse. April 1923 postmark. [No. A-12773]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Trees; Cannons
